# Nelson Land & Stump Services

> Professional stump grinding, brush hogging, and land clearing services in Upstate South Carolina. Family-owned business based in Williamston, SC.

## About

Nelson Land & Stump Services provides professional land clearing services throughout Greenville, Anderson, Pickens, and Oconee Counties in South Carolina. We specialize in stump grinding, brush hogging, and complete lot clearing for residential and commercial properties.

## Contact Information

- Business Name: Nelson Land & Stump Services
- Phone: (864) 760-9203
- Email: tigernelson@gmail.com
- Address: 230 Lewis Road, Williamston, SC 29697
- Hours: Monday-Saturday, 7:00 AM - 6:00 PM

## Services

### Stump Grinding
Professional stump removal that grinds stumps 6-8 inches below ground level. Pricing: $75-$400 per stump depending on size.

### Brush Hogging
Heavy-duty field mowing and brush clearing for overgrown properties, fence lines, and trails. Pricing: $150-$500 per acre.

### Land Clearing
Complete lot clearing for construction, development, or property improvement including tree removal, stump grinding, and debris removal. Pricing: $1,500-$6,000+ per acre.

## Service Areas

### Greenville County
Greenville, Simpsonville, Greer, Mauldin, Travelers Rest, Fountain Inn

### Anderson County
Anderson, Pendleton, Williamston, Belton, Honea Path, Iva

### Pickens County
Easley, Pickens, Clemson, Liberty, Central, Norris

### Oconee County
Seneca, Walhalla, Westminster, Salem, West Union, Fair Play
